mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_PNM, PA_ENTY_PNM, PA_ATTR_PNM, CH_ENTY_PNM, CH_ATTR_PNM, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_SUBJ_PNM, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_PNM, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.PDM_REL_PNM, A.PA_ENTY_PNM, A.PA_ATTR_PNM, A.CH_ENTY_PNM, A.CH_ATTR_PNM, A.PDM_REL_ID, A.PDM_REL_LNM, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.RQST_DCD, A.REL_TYP_CD, A.CRD_TYP_CD, A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_SUBJ_PNM, A.PA_ENTY_ID, A.PA_ATTR_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_PNM, A.CH_ENTY_ID, A.CH_ATTR_ID, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_PDM_REL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_PNM, PA_ENTY_PNM, PA_ATTR_PNM, CH_ENTY_PNM, CH_ATTR_PNM, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_SUBJ_PNM, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_PNM, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into WAQ_PDM_REL
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO,
PDM_REL_PNM,
PA_ENTY_PNM,
PA_ATTR_PNM,
CH_ENTY_PNM,
CH_ATTR_PNM,
PDM_REL_ID,
PDM_REL_LNM,

RQST_DCD,
REL_TYP_CD,

PA_OPT_TYP_CD,
PA_SUBJ_ID,
PA_SUBJ_PNM,
PA_ENTY_ID,
PA_ATTR_ID,
CH_SUBJ_ID,
CH_SUBJ_PNM,
CH_ENTY_ID,
CH_ATTR_ID,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
#{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
1,
#{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOW(), #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(),
#{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAQ_PDM_REL
PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_PNM = #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_PNM = #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ENTY_PNM = #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_ATTR_PNM = #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ENTY_PNM = #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_ATTR_PNM = #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PDM_REL_PNM = #{bfPdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_PNM = #{bfPaEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_PNM = #{bfPaAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_PNM = #{bfChEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_PNM = #{bfChAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_PDM_REL set PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_PNM = #{paSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_PNM = #{chSubjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_PNM = #{paEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_PNM = #{paAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_PNM = #{chEntyPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_PNM = #{chAttrPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL A SET REG_TYP_CD = (select case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when MAX(B.PDM_REL_PNM) IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end from WAM_PDM_REL B where B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') AND B.CH_ATTR_ID = ( SELECT PC.PDM_COL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_COL PC INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL PT ON PC.PDM_TBL_ID = PT.PDM_TBL_ID AND PT.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ S ON PT.SUBJ_ID = S.SUBJ_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE PC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND PC.PDM_TBL_ID = B.CH_ENTY_ID AND PT.SUBJ_ID = B.CH_SUBJ_ID AND PC.PDM_COL_PNM = A.CH_ATTR_PNM ) AND B.PA_ATTR_ID = ( SELECT PC.PDM_COL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_COL PC INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL PT ON PC.PDM_TBL_ID = PT.PDM_TBL_ID AND PT.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ S ON PT.SUBJ_ID = S.SUBJ_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE PC.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND PC.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PA_ENTY_ID AND PT.SUBJ_ID = B.PA_SUBJ_ID AND PC.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PA_ATTR_PNM ) and B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM ) ,VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL A SET (PA_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID) = (select B.SUBJ_ID, C.SUBJ_ID from WAA_SUBJ B INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON 1=1 AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') where B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND C.FULL_PATH = A.CH_SUBJ_PNM ) ,VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR001) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PA_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티명 미존재 (PR002) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 속성명 미존재 (PR003) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON D.SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PA_ATTR_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL E ON D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PA_ATTR_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR004) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티명 미존재 (PR005) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.CH_SUBJ_PNM ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 속성명 미존재 (PR006) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON D.SUBJ_ID = F.SUBJ_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.CH_ATTR_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.CH_SUBJ_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_COL E ON D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.CH_ATTR_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 관계명 내용 불일치 (PR007) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND ( D.PDM_REL_LNM != A.PDM_REL_LNM OR D.CRD_TYP_CD != A.CRD_TYP_CD OR D.REL_TYP_CD != A.REL_TYP_CD OR D.PA_OPT_TYP_CD != A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD )
)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 미존재 관계 (PC009) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL E ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND E.SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL F ON F.FULL_PATH = E.FULL_PATH AND F.PDM_TBL_PNM = E.PDM_TBL_PNM
WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM )

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 관계(요청중인 테이블일 경우 전체 적용...) (PR010) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND COALESCE(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL F ON F.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM
AND F.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH WHERE F.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND F.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

--검증쿼리 : 부모, 자식엔터티중 하나는 테이블명과 일치해야함 (PR008) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND ( D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_ENTY_PNM OR D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_ENTY_PNM )
)

--검증쿼리 : 중복 관계명 (부모, 자식내용까지) 동일한 관계 검출(PR011)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO
AND A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND A.PA_SUBJ_PNM = D.PA_SUBJ_PNM AND A.PA_ENTY_PNM = D.PA_ENTY_PNM AND A.PA_ATTR_PNM = D.PA_ATTR_PNM AND A.CH_SUBJ_PNM = D.CH_SUBJ_PNM AND A.CH_ENTY_PNM = D.CH_ENTY_PNM AND A.CH_ATTR_PNM = D.CH_ATTR_PNM
AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)

--검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (PR000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT A.* ,(SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE PDM_TBL_ID = A.PA_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AS PA_ENTY_PNM ,(SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE PDM_TBL_ID = A.CH_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AS CH_ENTY_PNM ,(SELECT PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE PDM_COL_ID = A.PA_ATTR_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AS PA_ATTR_PNM ,(SELECT PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE PDM_COL_ID = A.CH_ATTR_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AS CH_ATTR_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_REL A ) D WHERE A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND COALESCE(A.PA_ENTY_PNM,'_') = COALESCE(D.PA_ENTY_PNM,'_') AND COALESCE(A.CH_ENTY_PNM,'_') = COALESCE(D.CH_ENTY_PNM,'_')
AND COALESCE(A.PA_ATTR_PNM,'_') = COALESCE(D.PA_ATTR_PNM,'_') AND COALESCE(A.CH_ATTR_PNM,'_') = COALESCE(D.CH_ATTR_PNM,'_') AND COALESCE(A.PDM_REL_LNM, '_') = COALESCE(D.PDM_REL_LNM, '_') AND COALESCE(A.REL_TYP_CD, '_') = COALESCE(D.REL_TYP_CD, '_') AND COALESCE(A.CRD_TYP_CD, '_') = COALESCE(D.CRD_TYP_CD, '_') AND COALESCE(A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, '_') = COALESCE(D.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, '_') AND COALESCE(A.OBJ_DESCN, '_') = COALESCE(D.OBJ_DESCN, '_') )
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT B.* FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
--WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL A SET (PDM_REL_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT D.PDM_REL_ID , COALESCE(D.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , D.FRS_RQST_DTM , D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON B.SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND B.PDM_TBL_PNM = C.PDM_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL D ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO
AND A.PA_SUBJ_PNM = ( SELECT FULL_PATH FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE SUBJ_ID = D.PA_SUBJ_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AND A.PA_ENTY_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE PDM_TBL_ID = D.PA_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND A.PA_ATTR_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE PDM_COL_ID = D.PA_ATTR_ID AND PDM_TBL_ID = D.PA_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND A.CH_SUBJ_PNM = ( SELECT FULL_PATH FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AND A.CH_ENTY_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND A.CH_ATTR_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE PDM_COL_ID = D.CH_ATTR_ID AND PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON B.SUBJ_ID = C.SUBJ_ID AND B.PDM_TBL_PNM = C.PDM_TBL_PNM
JOIN WAM_PDM_REL D ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND A.CH_SUBJ_PNM = ( SELECT FULL_PATH FROM WAA_SUBJ WHERE SUBJ_ID = D.CH_SUBJ_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AND A.CH_ENTY_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_TBL WHERE PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) AND A.CH_ATTR_PNM = ( SELECT PDM_COL_PNM FROM WAM_PDM_COL WHERE PDM_COL_ID = D.CH_ATTR_ID AND PDM_TBL_ID = D.CH_ENTY_ID AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )
AND A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... )

--주제영역 ID, 테이블 ID 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_PDM_REL X SET (PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.PDM_TBL_ID, D.PDM_COL_ID, C.PDM_TBL_ID, E.PDM_COL_ID, NOW(), A.APRV_USER_ID FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON 1=1 AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL C ON 1=1 AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL D ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON C.PDM_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND B.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.PA_ENTY_PNM AND C.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.CH_ENTY_PNM AND D.PDM_COL_PNM = X.PA_ATTR_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = X.CH_ATTR_PNM AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인대상만... ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능
mapper.sql: A.PDM_REL_PNM, A.PDM_REL_LNM, A.REL_TYP_CD, A.CRD_TYP_CD, A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD , A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_ENTY_ID, A.PA_ATTR_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_ENTY_ID, A.CH_ATTR_ID , A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DTL_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.delete:
--WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_PDM_REL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL CC ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = CC.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND D.PDM_TBL_ID = A.CH_ENTY_ID AND D.SUBJ_ID = A.CH_SUBJ_ID AND CC.PDM_COL_ID = A.CH_ATTR_ID AND C.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID
AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND C.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT INTO WAM_PDM_REL SELECT A.PDM_REL_ID , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL A JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update:
--WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_PDM_REL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.PA_SUBJ_ID = A.PA_SUBJ_ID AND C.PA_ENTY_ID = A.PA_ENTY_ID AND C.PA_ATTR_ID = A.PA_ATTR_ID AND C.CH_SUBJ_ID = A.CH_SUBJ_ID AND C.CH_ENTY_ID = A.CH_ENTY_ID AND C.CH_ATTR_ID = A.CH_ATTR_ID AND C.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID
AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) AND EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT INTO WAH_PDM_REL SELECT A.PDM_REL_ID , TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL A JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

--테이블 추가시 WAM에 존재하는 컬럼 추가한다. INSERT INTO WAQ_PDM_REL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_PNM, PDM_REL_LNM, RQST_DCD , REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_SUBJ_PNM, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ENTY_PNM, PA_ATTR_ID, PA_ATTR_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_PNM, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ENTY_PNM, CH_ATTR_ID, CH_ATTR_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_REL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.PDM_REL_ID, C.PDM_REL_PNM, C.PDM_REL_LNM, 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , C.REL_TYP_CD, C.CRD_TYP_CD, C.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, C.PA_SUBJ_ID, D.FULL_PATH, C.PA_ENTY_ID, E.PDM_TBL_PNM, C.PA_ATTR_ID, F.PDM_COL_PNM , C.CH_SUBJ_ID, G.FULL_PATH, C.CH_ENTY_ID, H.PDM_TBL_PNM, C.CH_ATTR_ID, I.PDM_COL_PNM , C.OBJ_DESCN, C.OBJ_VERS, B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, NOW(), B.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL C ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = C.CH_ENTY_ID AND A.SUBJ_ID = C.CH_SUBJ_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ D ON C.PA_SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL E ON C.PA_ENTY_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL F ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.PA_ATTR_ID = F.PDM_COL_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ G ON C.CH_SUBJ_ID = G.SUBJ_ID AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND G.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL H ON C.CH_ENTY_ID = H.PDM_TBL_ID AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL I ON H.PDM_TBL_ID = I.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.CH_ATTR_ID = I.PDM_COL_ID AND I.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
